sn14.14:4.2: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
sn14.14:4.3: Those interested in low things come together and converge with those interested in low things.
sn14.14:4.4: Those interested in good things come together and converge with those interested in good things.
sn14.14:5.1: In the past, too, sentient beings came together and converged because of an element. …
sn14.14:6.1: In the future, too, sentient beings will come together and converge because of an element. …
sn14.14:7.1: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
sn14.14:7.2: Those interested in low things come together and converge with those interested in low things.
sn14.14:7.3: Those interested in good things come together and converge with those interested in good things.”
